name: Royal Battleground IO
storyline:
Warrior players will fight for the title of Lord of the Arena! On the way to the target will meet the most hardcore battles and mega powerful opponents. You have to look for magical chests with charms and magical powers. Artifacts located in the chests will help fire or air vortex neutralize the enemies.

Show everyone what you are capable of.
Join the new fantasy multiplayer and madness game Royal Battleground IO.
summary:
Discover the best strategies and become the best general in the world!

Create your undefeatable army and unleash it against other players in quick uncontrollable battles! Discover the best strategies and become the best general in the world!
